title: Headless Joe
description: While playing, robot Joe literally lost his head. But it's not as hopeless as it seems. To get it back in place and screw it tightly, Joe needs to solve puzzles and collect all the bolts. But he can’t do this without your help!
instructions: Guide Joe through all the game levels, solving puzzles and avoiding danger. Press buttons, rotate levers, use elevators and platforms. Joe is a fragile guy. Don't let him fall! Try to get the maximum number of stars at all levels. You will have to try hard for this! Controls: PC: use the mouse to control Joe, press buttons and interact with other game elements. 'P'/'Esc' - pause. 'R' - restart level. Mobile: use touch control to control Joe, press buttons and interact with other game elements.

title: Black Hole: Beauty Makeup
description: Black Hole: Beauty Makeup is a game where the player controls a black hole trying to devour as many objects around it as possible. Eat more, grow more, then create a beauty makeover! Cool black hole simulator. Absorb different objects. Unlock skins. Do you like black hole and simulators?
instructions: The player controls the black hole by moving it around the screen and trying to absorb as many objects as possible. The more objects the player absorbs, the more points he gets.

title: Detective - Logic Puzzles
description: Become a Detective! Solve logic puzzles to find the criminal! Lots of levels and interesting stories! You will have to solve a lot of different cases, in this you will be helped by the method of deduction known to all detectives.
instructions: 1) Use the hints to put ticks or crosses on the field. 2) When the whole field is marked, the case is solved. 3) Play the extra mode to earn clues and unlock a new story!

title: Farmer Pedro
description: Get ready to till the soil and reap the rewards in Farmer Pedro! In this charming 3D farming simulator, you’ll take on the role of Pedro, a humble farmer with a big dream - to build the most bountiful farm in the countryside. Start by driving your trusty tractor around the initial plot of land, harvesting a variety of crops like corn, tomatoes, carrots, and more. As you grow and harvest your crops, you’ll earn cash that can be used to expand your farmland and unlock access to new crops.
instructions: Harvest crops and turn them into cash. Grow your farmland.

title: Racing Car Destroying Zombie
description: Zombie Racing Car fast-paced physics-based racing game. You’re in for the ride of your life through a zombie apocalypse! Drive your car through deserts, forests, abandoned city,...surrounded by zombies, earn cash, upgrade your car powerful ones. Steer your car to keep balance on the hills while trying to smash zombies into debris. It's you against a boatload of super-strong zombies!
instructions: Use Left Arrow, Right Arrow and press the shooting button, rotation button to control the car

title: Collect Em All
description: Collect Em All! Is a puzzle game where you connect all the adjacent same colored blocks. Make long chains of colors to create beautiful sounds and unlock explosive power-ups! Connect the dots to crush them. You can make a limited number of moves, and you cannot go back on yourself, so make sure to plan your path. Create the longest chains for the biggest reward! Come back every day to unlock new daily bonuses !
instructions: Easy to control, simple tap on the block and swipe across the adjacent same-colored blocks! Watch out your moves, you need to achieve the objective before you run out! Make incredible combo moves to unlock power-ups that explosively clear and shuffle the ball board. The craziest chains earn you bonus moves, so keep getting those long lines to stay in the game and rack up your best score yet.

title: Bouncy Barn
description: Bouncy Barn is a lively farm simulation game where players explore the charming world of farm life. Care for cute animals like chickens, cows, and goats. Feed and nurture your animals to keep them happy, and in return, they’ll provide valuable produce like eggs and milk. Harvest these goodies and sell them at the market to earn profits for expanding and upgrading your farm. With vibrant graphics and engaging gameplay, Bouncy Barn provides a fun escape to create your dream farm!
instructions: Mouse to Play

title: Dice Fusion
description: Dice Fusion is a casual game with puzzle content. The game is easy to understand and use the game mechanism, as well as highly strategic gameplay, colorful vision and with a leisurely background sound, to bring users visual and auditory dual enjoyment, so as to achieve the relaxation of the user's physical and mental needs.
instructions: Drag the mouse dice to merge, and complete the goal of each level to get a reward

title: Fairy Wingerella
description: Soar through the skies with Fairy Wingerella in this action-packed arcade adventure! Meet Wingerella, a fearless and ambitious fairy striving to become the most powerful of her kind. Embark on her magical journey, navigating enchanting skies and conquering exciting challenges. With captivating visuals and engaging gameplay, this adventure promises endless fun and excitement!
instructions: Master the art of flight with Wingerella by using your keyboard or touch screen controls. Steer clear of obstacles while gathering power-ups to enhance her strength and magical abilities. Each level introduces fresh challenges and trials, pushing you to soar higher and achieve greatness!

title: 2048 Match Balls
description: With super simple rules and addictive gameplay, this logic game offers endless fun while challenging your brain. Merge balls and level up. Each merge increases the value of the balls while also changing their color and size. Be smart and dive into a vibrant world of numbers!
instructions: The player must shoot colored balls with numbers to merge them and reach 2048. Each ball displays a number, starting at 2. By merging balls with the same value, players create balls with higher numbers, progressing as follows: 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, and so on, until reaching 2048.

title: Water Dig Rescue
description: Dive into the captivating world of "Water Dig Rescue," a physics-based puzzle game where strategy and water manipulation go hand-in-hand. Players carve their way through sand to guide streams of water, aiming to fill a waiting truck at each level's end. With a touch of ingenuity and the laws of physics, can you solve the puzzles and achieve a triumphant splash?
instructions: Objective: Your goal is to collect enough water in the destination truck to win the level. Interact: Click and drag on the sand to dig a path for the water to flow. Collect: Guide the water to collect golden balls for extra points. Solve: Navigate through a variety of obstacles and utilize the environment to lead water to the truck. Advance: Complete the level to move onto the next, with each stage increasing in complexity.

title: Jelly-Belly. Make the Elephant
description: It is a puzzle like "Watermelon game" where you need drop animals in a container and try not to cross the top line. Animals of the same type will combine and create a larger animal. Merge the animals to create the biggest animal - Elephant.
instructions: Connect same animals with your finger or mouse to get new ones! Keyboard arrows to move new animal Spacebar or down arrow to drop the animal Game will over when animal crossed the top line.

title: Mr Bullet: Stealth Ninja Killstreak
description: Stealth action about a special agent! Third-person shooter about secret missions. Shootouts with stickmen. Physical destruction! Battles with dangerous Bosses. Tanks, Helicopters, Mutants! Road chases with destructible cars and much more!
instructions: To win - you need to eliminate all opponents on the level. Controls: PC - use the mouse to control the camera. Shooting is automatic when the sight is aimed at the enemy. Mobile - use your finger to control the camera. Shooting is automatic when the sight is aimed at the enemy.

title: Crazy Bus Station
description: Embark on a thrilling puzzle adventure! Maneuver buses through challenging parking lots, match cars with their passengers, and clear the path. Unlock unique vehicles, tackle puzzles of all difficulty levels, and use boosters to sort or shuffle when needed. With vibrant graphics and creative gameplay, this game offers fun for players of all ages!
instructions: Match cars with passengers and clear the parking lot! Click to move cars in the arrow's direction but ensure the path is clear. Use boosters to sort or shuffle when stuck!

title: Hotel Fever Tycoon
description: Wanna be a Hotel Empire Tycoon or a Top Cooking Chef? Come to "Hotel Fever Tycoon" to start an interesting hotel management and cooking journey with Emma and Uncle George! Work together to build your world-class hotel chain!
instructions: Work hard to upgrade the hotel, complete each guest's order efficiently to unlock more theme hotels

title: Crazy Descent
description: An exciting race with rivals along the track high in the sky! Push your rivals off the track, dodge obstacles and reach the finish line first. Pump up the car to make the descent even faster.
instructions: On the phone: swipe left/right On a computer: press W - go forward, press A/D - turn, R - restart Avoid obstacles - they destroy the car

title: Good Sort Master: Triple Match
description: A new game for those who like to put order on the shelf, in the closet, in the refrigerator. Collect identical items in groups of 3 - sort, arrange, tidy! Connect items three in a row, create coziness! Cleaning has never been so interesting and fun! A simple and relaxing game for women and men of all ages!
instructions: 1. Drag items to place 3 identical items on the same shelf. 2. Remove all items on the shelves to complete the level. 3. Complete levels to discover more of your favorite items!

title: Cube Combo
description: CubeCombo is a casual puzzle game. In this game, players need to use their wits by moving blocks with numbers, and merge the same blocks together until only one block is left, to complete the challenge. When only one number block is left in the panel or the target number block is synthesized, the current level is passed and a new level is opened.
instructions: Drag the blocks to combine the same numbers until the composition goal is complete

title: Helix Crush
description: "The gameplay is very simple and can be accomplished with only one finger, yet it will also bring you countless challenges and fun. You need to jump and fall through the helix tower, cutting through the colorful fruit and cake slices on the way. But be careful! There are many obstacles and traps along the way, and it will be up to your reflexes and luck to get through them.
instructions: Using the arrow keys to play the game.

title: Stack n Sort
description: Welcome to Stack n Sort, the ultimate color stack game that combines precision, hoop sort strategy, and excitement in one addictive experience. Immerse yourself in a world of vibrant stack color and dynamic hoop sort challenges as you test your skills and aim for high scores. Whether you’re a casual gamer or a competitive enthusiast, hoop stack offers endless fun and engagement.
instructions: Using mouse to move the ropes

title: Ragdoll Show: Throw, Break and Destroy!
description: Dive into the chaotic fun of ragdoll mayhem! Navigate thrilling challenges by guiding your ragdoll character through each level, leveraging realistic physics for epic destruction. Sharpen your skills and unleash maximum chaos—can you conquer every challenge and emerge victorious?
instructions: Drag the character onto different objects and watch the chaos unfold. Experiment with various objects and angles to maximize the damage. Get ready to throw, break, and destroy the ragdoll!

title: Block Puzzle Travel
description: The goal of the game is to destroy as many blocks as possible. By doing so, you will earn points for completing the game perfectly. By solving puzzles, you train your attention, thought processes and brain. In this game you have to achieve the maximum result, and pass all levels.
instructions: Destroy diamond blocks, earn points, pass level after level until you pass the game completely. The more blocks destroyed in one turn, the more points the player gets.

title: Demolition Derby Derby
description: Welcome to Demolition Derby the mobile sensation where you control the chaos! Strategically tap to toss dynamite and swipe to send rocks crashing down. Decimate buildings and statues with precision in this hyper-casual game.
instructions: The navigation in this game is very simple. Use your mouse or tap the screen to navigate in this game.

title: Perfect Piano Magic
description: Perfect Piano Magic is a fun casual game. If you are a big fan of Piano Magic games, then this is a game you can't afford to miss! The gameplay of this game is extremely similar to Piano Magic, you need to shoot the blocks with a gun to capture the beat. You have three chances per game, start now and feel the real music when you click the blocks, enjoy the beats, and get ready to experience the delightful music and become a rhythm master!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Emoji Smasher - Smiley Game
description: Emoji Smasher is a Hyper Casual game to make you smile while playing! Guess the emoticon expressions in this fast-paced challenge! Tap on emojis and win this lively, emoji-filled adventure.
instructions: Tap on the Sad and Angry Smileys and make them happy. One-tap easy-to-play with stunning visual effects and addictive game-play mechanics.

title: Dirty Money The Rich Get Rich
description: Dirty Money: The Rich Get Rich is a money clicker relaxation game. You are permitted to make money by tapping. When you earn some money and level up on the corresponding level, you can speed up by upgrading in the Growth, using the Invest, and making the Assets. The more money you make, the more functions you can unlock and use. I hope you will complete the target and make 100 million!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: 3D Match Puzzle Mania
description: Enter the world of match-3 game brought to life in 3D. Solve captivating puzzles and collect coins to acquire power-ups. Complete daily tasks to earn fantastic bonuses and experience endless fun with every move you make!
instructions: The game features limitless levels. Players match objects to clear levels and progress. Each level has three difficulties and four unique abilities that help overcome challenges. Daily quests and rotating events provide opportunities for additional rewards.

title: Hook Master Mafia City
description: Hook Master: Mafia City is a casual puzzle game that combines puzzle solving, escape and collecting elements. In this dangerous city, you have to solve puzzles with your smart mind and use a cool grappling hook and swing skills, like a secret agent's flexible dodge, precise strike and successfully escape the enemy hunt! There are two kinds of gameplay: grappling and swinging. Use the grapple for flexible movement, quickly across the city by snagging walls, buildings and so on.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: DriftClicker
description: Race Clicker: DRIFT MAX is an action clicker that immerses you in the world of thrilling drift races, demanding lightning-fast reflexes and the ability to make decisions at high speed. Participate in dynamic drift where every turn is a high-speed challenge. - Open containers to obtain unique parts and enhance your car. - Participate in high-stakes races to earn keys for containers and unlock new possibilities. - Upgrade your car to dominate races and defeat all your rivals.
instructions: Clicker controls: 1. Click on the car or use space to gain speed and earn money. 2. Spend money on leveling up your car to drive faster. Race controls: 1. Gain as much speed as possible by tapping or clicking the mouse or using space key at the beginning of the race. 2. Control using the keys "A", "D" or swipes on the screen. 3. Aim at the racers, catch up and knock them down.

title: Brick Breaker Chipi Chipi Chapa Chapa Cat
description: Break bricks, collect power-ups for more fun breaking bricks and watch Chipy Chipy Chipa Cat and El Primo Bara Bere dancing. Go through interesting and exciting levels in the fun game about Chippy Chippy Chippy Chappa Chappa Cat and El Primo. Pass levels of different difficulty and set a personal record.
instructions: Control the bottom area and hit the balls into the green blocks. Once all the green blocks are destroyed, the level will be completed. Collect falling bonuses in order to increase the number of balls and gain extra life.

title: Sword Play! Ninja Slice Runner
description: Become a legendary kunai master in this thrilling combination of dynamic gameplay and classic ninja action. Play offline and enjoy the freedom to dive into the adventure whenever you want. Slice through foes, overcome obstacles, and set out on an epic ninja quest without boundaries. Will you seize the blade and claim your place as the ultimate ninja warrior?
instructions: Navigating the game is easy and intuitive. Use your mouse on a desktop or simply tap with your finger on mobile devices.

title: Spider-Noob obstacle course
description: Noob was bitten by a creeper-spider and became a spider-noob! Help Noob train in the big city, fly on webs, collect badges, unlock new costumes, and complete challenges. Unlock new levels. Complete all the levels and turn Noob into a Pro-spider
instructions: The game features very simple controls, with badges scattered throughout the level. When near a badge, hold down the tap or mouse button to grab onto it, then release at the right time to continue your flight. There is also a hidden icon on each level, see if you can find it. Each badge collected earns points, try to collect as many as possible on each level. Use your points and badges to purchase new costumes for Nubika, try to collect them all.

title: Big Bad Ape
description: In Big Bad Ape, you will play as an unstoppable giant ape. Join this casual battle and experience the exhilaration of destroying a city! Freed from a lab experiment, this furious monster is now unleashed. As this super monster, your job is to destroy everything.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: 9 Blocks
description: Logical puzzle game with original gameplay. The goal is to fill all empty places in a chip merging with chips next to this one.
instructions: Rotate and drag chips to each other to combine their contained squares to make a full-filled chip.

title: MineBlocks 3D Maze
description: MineBlocks 3D Maze: A Mind-Bending Adventure in a Blocky World! Get ready to step into a world of puzzles and creativity with MineBlocks 3D Maze—an incredible game that’s perfect for kids and adults alike. If you’re a fan of brain-teasers and enjoy a good challenge, this 3D puzzle game is exactly what you need. It’s all about strategy, logic, and a little bit of muscle (virtual, of course)! Push the blocks strategically to guide them onto the altars scattered across the level.
instructions: Arrow or WASD keys to move the player.

title: Star Exiles
description: Embark on an incredible adventure where the future of humanity is on the brink of an abyss. The earth has turned into a devastated desert after a terrible natural disaster. The only salvation for humanity is the colonization of other planets. Take part in a large-scale space expedition. You have to become one of the brave settler colonists, board a spaceship and fight the alien threat. Go to uncharted planets, look for resources for survival, create new settlements and protect them from enemies.
instructions: Controls in battle: on a computer: use the mouse to control the direction of the ship's movement. on phone: touch and swipe the screen in the direction you want to move your spaceship. Shooting is carried out automatically when you touch the screen. During the battle on the planet, be sure to destroy hotbeds of infection. Collect crystals and DNA to buy new spaceships.

title: Merge Master
description: A casual mobile game centered around matching and elimination. The game features vibrant colors, coupled with a visual style rich in beach elements. With background music and sound effects reminiscent of leisurely walks along the beach, it creates a relaxed beach-strolling environment that immerses players in an auditory experience.
instructions: Players aim to combine larger numbers by clicking on adjacent identical numbers on the main game board to eliminate them and create a new number twice as large.

title: Tricky Arrow
description: Get ready to sharpen your skills in Tricky Arrow! Test your precision and reflexes as you shoot arrows at a spinning circle target. Aim for the bullseye and avoid hitting other arrows. With each twist and spin, the challenge grows, requiring strategy and accuracy. Simple yet addictive gameplay for all ages.
instructions: Aim and Shoot: Tap or click to shoot arrows at the spinning circle. Avoid Obstacles: Avoid hitting the other arrows already on the target. Precision is Key: Aim carefully as the spinning target gets trickier with each level. Advance Levels: Complete levels by successfully landing all your arrows.

title: Hexa Sort: Winter Edition
description: Step into a mesmerizing world of winter puzzles with Hexa Sort! More than just a game, it’s a journey into a frosty realm where every hexagonal tile sparkles like a snowflake. Match and merge the pieces to create perfect combinations, clearing the way for new challenges as snow crystals gently dissolve.
instructions: How to Play Hexa Sort: Winter Edition Goal: Arrange hexagonal tiles to complete lines or specific patterns and clear the board. How to Play: Drag tiles from the bottom of the screen onto the board and place them strategically. Scoring: Earn points by completing lines or patterns. The more lines cleared at once, the higher the score. Game Over: The game ends when there’s no space left for new tiles.

title: Scroll and Spot
description: Experience the joy of the holidays with Scroll and Spot, a unique Christmas-themed puzzle game! Explore two beautifully crafted images as you scroll to uncover five subtle differences hidden within.The scrolling feature keeps both images perfectly aligned, making it a dynamic and immersive puzzle experience. Challenge your observation skills and celebrate the holiday spirit with every discovery!
instructions: Drag the screen to scroll, tap to spot the differences, and find all 5 differences to advance to the next level!

title: Hexon Rush
description: Hexon Rush is a time limited puzzle game with a little bit of sci-fi look. Main goal in the Hexon Rush is connecting all the lines inside the hexagonal tiles before time runs out. There are 600 levels with increasing size, difficulty and complexity. Don't worry, you will have two types of helpers to solve these puzzles. Be careful when you spend them because they are hard to obtain.
instructions: Click on hexagon tiles to rotate them counter-clockwise. At the bottom of screen there are helpers. Click on the left one to freeze countdown for 5 seconds. Click on the right one to lock half of tiles in correct rotation automatically.

title: Merge Heroes
description: In this game, you will command squads of melee fighters and ranged archers fighting against waves of enemies. Your agility and strategic thinking will give you an edge to victory. Unlock new powerful fighters and accurate archers by combining those available for purchase. Place them on the map according to abilities and win. You will have to discover not only new characters, but also beautiful different worlds, enjoy our new game. Translated with DeepL.com (free version)
instructions: Merge same characters by dragging one on top of another to get more powerful ones. Unlock new characters and expand your army

title: Superwings Subway
description: Explore with ASTRA: Cross the space dodging all kinds of obstacles with Astra. Move along three rails dodging, jumping or passing under all kinds of traps and avoid meteorites. Be careful, the rails are incomplete and you can fall into the void.
instructions: Use your mouse or finger to move in any direction, jump or crouch.

title: Merge Muscle
description: Create the most powerful gym, connect athletes! A large gym is at your disposal. Your task is to get new athletes, combine similar ones to get more powerful athletes. The most powerful athletes can be taken to a boxing competition. You need to click as often and quickly as possible to defeat your opponent in a difficult battle.
instructions: The goal of the game is to open all the characters, click to get new characters, connect the same ones to unlock stronger athletes. Control on a mobile device: touch. Controls on desktop: Left mouse button

title: Funny Balls 2048
description: Funny Balls 2048 combines the 2048 genre with physics. Drop bouncing balls so that to collapse them with identical ones and get a ball of 2 times more value. The game has boosters that will make the game more exciting, as well as different ball skins.
instructions: Drop the balls and collect large denominations, there are hints in the game. The balls collapse according to the 2048 principle, i.e. two balls with the same face value will give a ball with a 2-fold larger face value. The game records a record, which is also displayed on the leaderboard, where you can compare yourself with other players.

title: Merge Balls New Years Toys in 3D!
description: ● A game with a New Year's atmosphere! Compete with friends and colleagues?! In the game you have a play area? where balls fall and connect if they have the same color! Connect as many balls as possible to make the biggest one, save up points?! Be the first on the leaderboard?! Play and relax ?!
instructions: 1. At first it will be easy to connect the balls?, but over time there will be more and more of them??. Once you connect the biggest ball in this game, it will disappear? and give you the most points?! If one of the balls touches the line and lies on it for some time, then you will lose?, and the game will start again?! 2. Press and hold your finger or mouse to control the ball. Release your finger or mouse button to let the ball fall onto the field?! 3. Enjoy the game?!

title: Funny Walk Fail Run
description: Funny Walk Fail Run is a fun-filled arcade action game with funny and magical gameplay! You will control a villain in the game to do challenges. But don't expect him to walk steadily, because he always falls and bumps in all sorts of funny positions! Your job is to help him navigate each step of the shaky road.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Flip Knife
description: Explore different rooms, jump on all sorts of objects: shelves, tables, chairs, sofas, and even subwoofers!Make the knife jump or even double flip. How? Just tap the screen at the right moment and jump!
instructions: Tap the screen at the right moment and jump

title: Puzzles Balls Merge the New Year!
description: ● This New Year's game is more difficult than it might seem ?! You have a playing field? on which you need to throw balls and connect the same ones??! Until you get the biggest and most beautiful one?! Save up points?! Compete with friends and colleagues to become the best?! Enjoy your game?!
instructions: 1. At first it will be easy to connect the balls?, but over time there will be more and more of them??. As soon as you connect the most beautiful ball in this game, it will disappear? and give you the most points?! If one of the lines is filled with balls ?, the game will start again ?! 2. Press and hold your finger or mouse to control the ball?. Release your finger or mouse button to let the ball? fall onto the field?! 3. Enjoy the game?!

title: Sprunki Find The Differences
description: Unleash Your Detective Skills with Sprunki Find The Differences! Inspired by the charming world of Sprunki, this game takes your observation skills to the next level. Dive into beautifully crafted scenes filled with vibrant details, where your task is to spot the differences between two seemingly identical images. Whether you're a fan of Sprunki or just love a good brain teaser, Sprunki Find The Differences offers a perfect mix of challenge and fun for players of all ages
instructions: Mouse Tap
